name: Yasha and Kaya
description: Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
192 mana, 0.8 mana regeneration and 1.6% flat base magic resistance
16 main attack damage to agility/intelligence heroes
14.4 main attack damage to universal heroes
For Yasha-based items: Multiple sources of movement speed do not stack
For Yasha-based items: Multiple sources of attack speed fully stack
For Kaya-based items: Multiple sources of spell damage amplification do not stack
For Kaya-based items: Multiple sources of mana regeneration amplification do not stack
